reqs:
Equivalents: APBI 244
2009/10: Please note, the equivalent to "GEOB 204" is "APBI 244" and no longer "AGRO 244".
Note: This is a wait list for GEOG 204, section 101, Term 1. You will be moved into active registration if space becomes available. Wait list does not guarantee placement in this course.
description: Basic principles and processes of climatology. Energy and water balance concepts. Weather systems and climate change, microclimate of soils, crops, forests, and animals. Credit will be granted for only one of GEOB 200, GEOB 204, or APBI 244.
